document_data.name: Ragi al-Makruh
document_data.mainbody: '''Ragi al-Makruh''' was an influential merchant inhabiting [[Jumlat]] in the [[Pearl Cities]] region of [[west Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Ragi was exactly what he appeared to beâ€“a hulking angry brute. It was whispered that he had more money than brains and more brains than charm.
document_data.Activities: Ragi controlled most of the fleet associated with pearl diving. Many were surprised that he didn't immediately run his family's business into the ground upon gaining control.
document_data.Relationships: He spent much of his time paying homage to the Sultan and his Chief Vizier, collecting favors to be used when the moment was right.
